data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 87,900 people living in Sant Kabir Nagar through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sant Kabir Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Sant Kabir Nagar are far from Jesus.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Sant Kabir Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Sant Kabir Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, it’s possible most of the 85,867 lost people in  Sant Kabir Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Sant Kabir Nagar.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.focus_label: Sant Kabir Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Father, help the 967 believers in Sant Kabir Nagar to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
